fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-At the start of night one, you may choose a contract from a list of three options.
Eliminate (3 roles that are not contracted)
Help (Neutral) Win.
Eliminate (role) at night.
-If you previously completed a contract last night, choose one of the following abilities to use tonight:
- The target you use this ability on acts twice tomorrow and tomorrow night.
- The target who you use this on is roleblocked, you learn their role, and who they would have targeted if not for your ability.
- The target is redirected to a user of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-After a contract is completed, you gain another choice of contracts.
- The host decides what the roles in () are.
